titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish organ transplant care to veterans at non-Department of Veterans Affairs facilities, and for other purposes.
Veterans Increased Choice for Transplanted Organs and Recovery Act of 2018
Veterans Increased Choice for Transplanted Organs and Recovery Act of 2018
VICTOR Act of 2018
VICTOR Act of 2018
VICTOR Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
